verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye the YY <S%H3050><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye the YY <S%H3068><s%> from the heavens <S%H8064><s%>: praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> him in the heights <S%H4791><s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye him, all his angels <S%H4397><s%>: praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye him, all his hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye him, sun <S%H8121><s%> and moon <S%H3394><s%>: praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> him, all ye stars <S%H3556><s%> of light <S%H216><s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> him, ye heavens <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and ye waters <S%H4325><s%> that be above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
Let them praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>: for he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and they were created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

He hath also stablished <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them for ever <S%H5703><s%> and ever <S%H5769><s%>: he hath made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a decree <S%H2706><s%> which shall not pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>, ye dragons <S%H8577><s%>, and all deeps <S%H8415><s%>:
Fire <S%H784><s%>, and hail <S%H1259><s%>; snow <S%H7950><s%>, and vapour <S%H7008><s%>; stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> fulfilling <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>:
Mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and all hills <S%H1389><s%>; fruitful <S%H6529><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%>, and all cedars <S%H730><s%>:
Beasts <S%H2416><s%>, and all cattle <S%H929><s%>; creeping things <S%H7431><s%>, and flying <S%H3671><s%> fowl <S%H6833><s%>:
Kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and all people <S%H3816><s%>; princes <S%H8269><s%>, and all judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>:
Both young men <S%H970><s%>, and maidens <S%H1330><s%>; old men <S%H2205><s%>, and children <S%H5288><s%>:

Let them praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>: for his name <S%H8034><s%> alone is excellent <S%H7682><s%> <S%H8737><s%>; his glory <S%H1935><s%> is above the earth <S%H776><s%> and heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

He also exalteth <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the shofar <S%H7161><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>, the praise <S%H8416><s%> of all his saints <S%H2623><s%>; even of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, a people <S%H5971><s%> near <S%H7138><s%> unto him. Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye the YY <S%H3050><s%>.
